definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Would you like to go cycling with me on the Road Around The Island on Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你愿意和我一起去环岛路骑自行车吗？

sentences.english: A lot of people make sure that they visit it when they come here.
sentences.chinese: 很多来这里游玩的人都一定会去哥伦布环岛。

sentences.english: and at that time Columbus Circle was very dirty.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，哥伦布环岛这儿还很脏。

sentences.english: Bernie and his friends plan to do a road trip around the island after their graduation.
sentences.chinese: 柏尼和他的朋友计画毕业后环岛旅行。

sentences.english: Parkview room decorated around the island model drawings.
sentences.chinese: 环岛丽园样板房装饰施工图。

sentences.english: "Did you know, " the cop says, "that at the last traffic roundabout, your wife fell out of the car?"
sentences.chinese: 你知道你妻子在前面的环岛从车上掉下来了吗？

sentences.english: What do you think of the big statue in Columbus Circle?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得哥伦布环岛上的那尊雕像怎么样？

sentences.english: There's one right up on Columbus right there.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦布环岛那儿就有一家。

sentences.english: We are considering taking a trip around the island.
So that's what I can tell you about Columbus Circle.
sentences.chinese: 那就是我能告诉你的关于哥伦布环岛的信息。

sentences.english: Trains sin and out of the island as well as island-looping high-speed trains have all halted services.
sentences.chinese: 进出海南岛的火车以及环岛高铁都已经停止运行了。

sentences.english: We happy to set foot on the island that extended upward path.
sentences.chinese: 大家欢快地踏上了那条向高处延伸的环岛路。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Columbus Circle?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我们讲讲哥伦布环岛吗？

sentences.english: After that, some of my classmates went to fish and others went to travel round the island in a boat.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，我的一些同学去去旅行环岛在船上钓鱼。

sentences.english: Do you have any personal experience with Columbus Circle?
sentences.chinese: 在哥伦布环岛，你有什么个人经历吗？

definition: Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
Suhua Highway, coastal road in northern Taiwan, built on the side of cliffs above the Pacific Ocean
Qijin or Chichin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
